name: HP NQ576AT Speaker Bar System - 2W (RMS) - Black

reviews.name: HP NQ576AT Speaker Bar System - 2W (RMS) - Black
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband as a Christmas present. He has been wanting one for a while. After only reading the one product description saying that the sound was not very good and there was a buzzing noise, I was very hesitant to get this one I also seen that it is for an HP only monitor after I had ordered it and was a little afraid that it wouldn't work! After opening it this morning he quickly rushed to hook it up. We did find that on our Dell monitors it wouldn't fit right. The hooks had a little raised place that just wouldn't allow it to go in. We cut them down flat and poof! It worked! As far as the sound, we hear nothing but great crystal sound! No buzzing or bad quality! So overall I am very happy with this purchase! Very great buy for your money!
reviews.title: Crystal clear sound, great for your money!

reviews.name: HP NQ576AT Speaker Bar System - 2W (RMS) - Black
reviews.reviewText: The speaker was easy to install,but the sound is not what I would have expected from HP. Their is noise when on mute when you move your mouse and buzzing from the speaker when turned up...:(
reviews.title: Get what you pay for

reviews.name: HP NQ576AT Speaker Bar System - 2W (RMS) - Black
reviews.reviewText: I didn't use this speaker with an HP monitor so I had to modify the top bracket to fit, but is the perfect size and sounds great.
reviews.title: Great sized speaker.

reviews.name: HP NQ576AT Speaker Bar System - 2W (RMS) - Black
reviews.reviewText: It's Great for Computers and also works Great on my 22" TV with a USB Plug and Earphone Jack!!
reviews.title: Works Great!!

reviews.name: HP NQ576AT Speaker Bar System - 2W (RMS) - Black
reviews.reviewText: I was really pleased to know that by using this bar it really enhanced the sound quality of my new 19" flat screen tv!
reviews.title: Speaker bar system made a world of difference!
